publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-438 Keith Brown: Clackmannanshire Tower Trail—That the Parliament recognises the launch of the Clackmannanshire Tower Trail on 7 September 2007; notes that the trail connects no fewer than five major historical sites: Alloa Tower, Castle Campbell, Clackmannan Tower, Sauchie Tower and Menstrie Castle; believes that the trail has the potential to become an important location for heritage and tourism in the area and beyond, and congratulates Clackmannanshire Council’s Museum and Heritage Service for developing such an excellent attraction.

S3M-438 Keith Brown: Clackmannanshire Tower Trail—That the Parliament recognises the launch of the Clackmannanshire Tower Trail on 7 September 2007; notes that the trail connects no fewer than five major historical sites: Alloa Tower, Castle Campbell, Clackmannan Tower, Sauchie Tower and Menstrie Castle; believes that the trail has the potential to become an important location for heritage and tourism in the area and beyond, and congratulates Clackmannanshire Council’s Museum and Heritage Service for developing such an excellent attraction.
